title: Add blog section to portfolio with external blog link

requirements.text: Create a new Blog section in the portfolio page that displays a list of blog posts with titles, descriptions, and external links

quotes: add a blog content inside the portfolio section

acceptanceCriteria: Blog section appears in the portfolio page layout between existing sections
Section follows the same visual style and theming as other portfolio sections
Blog posts are displayed in a card grid similar to Projects section

requirements.text: Add the blog post 'Deep Analysis of Behavioral Patterns' with the link https://gamedesignmastery.blogspot.com/2026/02/deep-analysis-of-behavioral-patterns.html to the blog section
acceptanceCriteria: Blog entry displays with title 'Deep Analysis of Behavioral Patterns'
Clicking the blog entry or a 'Read More' button opens the external link in a new tab
Link is correctly formatted and functional

requirements.text: Update the navigation header to include a Blog menu item that scrolls to the new blog section
acceptanceCriteria: Blog navigation item appears in the header menu
Clicking Blog scrolls smoothly to the blog section
Active state highlights correctly when blog section is in view

requirements.text: Add blog post data structure to the static portfolio data in frontend/src/data/portfolioData.ts with fields for title, description, date, and external URL
acceptanceCriteria: Blog posts array is added to portfolio data structure
Type definitions in portfolio.ts include BlogPost interface
Initial blog post entry is populated with the provided external link

constraints: Do not modify backend/main.mo - blog data is static frontend content
Do not edit immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui/*
Maintain consistency with existing section styling and layout patterns
Use React Query hooks pattern established in useQueries.ts for data fetching
nonGoals: Creating a backend API for blog post management
Implementing blog post creation or editing functionality
Adding comments or interaction features to blog posts
Embedding blog content directly - only external links are needed
